fields.title: EMA
fields.info: A dance troupe leader deals with personal and professional challenges.

fields.title: Bacurau
fields.info: Residents of a small Brazilian village notice that their town has vanished from most maps.

fields.title: Liquid Sky
fields.info: An alien visits New York City and interacts with the city's underground scene.

fields.title: Family Romance, LLC
fields.info: A film about a company that rents out family members for various occasions.

fields.title: 10,000 Waves
fields.info: A visual and poetic exploration of the devastating impact of the 2011 tsunami in Japan.

fields.title: Magnetic Rose
fields.info: A space opera about a group of space travelers who encounter a haunted spaceship.

fields.title: Walkabout
fields.info: Two siblings are stranded in the Australian desert and encounter an indigenous boy on his rite of passage.
A film director struggles with creative block while dealing with personal issues.

fields.title: The Favourite
fields.info: A historical drama about the intense rivalry between two cousins for the favor of Queen Anne.

fields.title: Shoplifters
fields.info: A Japanese family living in poverty resorts to shoplifting to survive.

fields.title: Bisbee ‘17
fields.info: A documentary about a reenactment of a historic labor strike in Bisbee, Arizona.

fields.title: Mauvais Sang
fields.info: A French film about a man who becomes involved in a criminal plot to steal a valuable drug.

fields.title: Private Life
fields.info: A couple struggles with infertility and the impact it has on their relationship.

fields.title: I Don't Feel at Home in This World Anymore
fields.info: A woman teams up with her eccentric neighbor to find the thieves who stole her possessions.

fields.title: Celine and Julie Go Boating
fields.info: A whimsical French film about two women who become involved in a mysterious story.

fields.title: Heaven Can Wait
fields.info: A comedy about a man who is reincarnated in the body of a wealthy playboy.

fields.title: Stinking Heaven
fields.info: A film about a group of people living in a commune and dealing with their personal struggles.

fields.title: Covergirl
fields.info: A musical drama about a young woman who becomes a cover girl and struggles with fame.

fields.title: Night Tide
fields.info: A film about a sailor who becomes romantically involved with a woman who may be a mermaid.

fields.title: The Souvenir
fields.info: A young film student falls into a turbulent relationship with an older man.

fields.title: Beach Rats
fields.info: A young man in Brooklyn navigates his sexuality and life on the fringes of society.

fields.title: Force Majeure
fields.info: A family vacation in the Alps is disrupted by a controlled avalanche and its aftermath.
